template.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a thin sheet of plastic or metal in a special shape or pattern, used to help cut other materials in a similar shape
template.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a computer document containing some basic information that you use as a model for writing other documents, such as business letters, envelopes etc
template.translation[0].definitions[2].d: something that is used as a model for another thing
template.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Her childhood became a template for how she brought up her own children.
